function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Large volume of communications data from a significant portion of the adult population of namibia was collected.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Modeling risk of cases occurring in specific grid cells","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using mobile phone call data records to analyze population movement","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of covariate data from populated areas with confirmed cases","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of locations with few cases from mapping analysis","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"De-identified data on malaria cases","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission season data collection","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of human movement patterns","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mismatch of measures and locations for disease elimination","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient targeted operations for identifying and managing asymptomatic and symptomatic infections","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate and untimely creation of risk maps for elimination programmes","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of capacity to rapidly provide diagnostically confirmed malaria incidence in very low transmission environments","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in credit guarantee ratio during the emergency stage of covid-19","category":"Finance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establishment of regional credit guarantee scheme in asean","category":"Finance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased credit guarantee ratios in asean member states due to covid-19","category":"Finance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unanticipated exogenous shock in the model","category":"Risk Analysis","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-stationarity of the series, as indicated by the kpss test.","category":"Risk Analysis","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity of people during data analysis and discussion.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of shared resources and facilities for conducting analysis.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost of borrowing for smes in developing nations","category":"Finance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Logistics disruptions in the short run","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Structural challenges in the long run","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in cash flow risk for smes","category":"Finance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpreparedness of smes to face disruptions caused by covid-19","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to the close physical proximity of individuals within the built environment.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to finance for smes","category":"Finance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals in smes can lead to the rapid spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data governance and quality control","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential lack of standardised data collection methods","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of data breaches in centralised data repositories leading to unauthorized access and use of sensitive information.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of privacy breaches and data misuse in federated data analysis and machine learning due to lack of standardized security measures across local nodes.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adopting a centralised infrastructure for data management","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of robust and trustful data sharing infrastructures in the medical world","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delays in authorization of clinical trials and studies by national regulatory bodies","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in pandemics over the 20th century","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Peri-urbanization of industrial agriculture in the global south","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inequity in access to basic infrastructure and exposure to environmental contamination","category":"Land Use","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of redundancy in critical supply chains and services","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban expansion encroaches on wildlife habitat, creating wuis. human activities in these  buffer zones  create stress for wild animals, facilitating viral shedding.","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of universal access to critical infrastructures increases susceptibility to disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralized environmental quality improvement is needed to reduce stresses that exacerbate the impact of shocks.","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate redundancy in production lines or supply chains may lead to disruptions in crucial product availability during a contagious disease outbreak.","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate redundancy in data gathering and monitoring systems for covid-19 may result in incomplete or delayed information about hotspots and infected areas, leading to uncontrolled spread of the disease.","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate redundancy in food supply chains may lead to shortages and hoarding behavior, exacerbating the impact of contagious diseases on vulnerable populations.","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Persistence of pathogens or vectors in soil, water, and pollutants","category":"Soil","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Healthcare product shortages in high-income nations","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on global commodity chains with low cost, just-in-time inventory, and specialized divisions of labor","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated water sources provide breeding grounds for disease-carrying mosquitoes, increasing the risk of malaria and dengue transmission.","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air pollution, including particulate matter and other pollutants, has been linked to increased severity and transmission of covid-19.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Habitat encroachment and fragmentation leading to increased wildlife-urban interfaces","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"}]}
